description: Director General Enterprise Application Services (DGEAS) will require four (4) Information Technology Security Threat and Risk Assessment (TRA) and Certification and Accreditation (C&A) Analysts to support activities related to the re-certification for DEIMS applications. Four analysts will be based in Ottawa, and will work together to provide specialized technical support to the DGSAE team. They will be required to conduct IT security threat and risk assessments, as well as certification and accreditation, for the DGSAE or other appropriate government entities as required. CAATs will be used for these services. Analytical and research software tools will be required and must be maintained on a government computer network. Analysts will have access to the solutions of existing security tools to ensure their infrastructure is managed securely and effectively.
duration_in_months: It is estimated that re-certification for all services could take 36 months if all anomalies are tackled through CAATs.

**RE-CERTIFICATION OF DEIMSAPPLICATIONS**
--------------------------------------

**-background**
----------------

The Department of National Defence (DND), through the Director General Enterprise Application Services (DGEAS), is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide Information Technology Security Threat and Risk Assessment (TRA) and Certification and Accreditation (C&A) Analysts to support the re-certification of DEIMS applications.

**Scope**
------------

The successful contractor will be required to provide four (4) analysts who will support activities related to the re-certification of DEIMS applications. This includes but is not limited to:

*   Conducting threat and risk assessments for DEIMS applications
*   Providing certification and accreditation services
*   Supporting the DND's Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) program
